tribal_chief.name: Tribal Chief
tribal_chief.special: Strongest unit, defeated only by Shadow Stalker when attacked
tribal_chief.description: Respected leader adorned with feathers and bone staff

warchief.name: Warchief
warchief.description: Veteran battle leader with axe and horned mask

clan_elder.name: Clan Elder
clan_elder.description: Wise elder guiding warriors with ritual paint and chants

battle_shaman.name: Battle Shaman
battle_shaman.special: Can bless nearby allies with spirit energy
battle_shaman.description: Mystic warrior using charms and ancestral magic

warrior_captain.name: Warrior Captain
warrior_captain.description: Fearless commander of warriors in the tribe

young_warrior.name: Young Warrior
young_warrior.description: Ambitious fighter with painted face and spear

veteran_fighter.name: Veteran Fighter
veteran_fighter.description: Battle-scarred warrior with shield and spear

trap_setter.name: Trap Setter
trap_setter.special: Only unit that can disarm Fire Pots
trap_setter.description: Expert in setting and defusing tribal traps

hunter.name: Hunter
hunter.special: Can move multiple spaces in a straight line
hunter.description: Swift tracker skilled with bow and spear

shadow_stalker.name: Shadow Stalker
shadow_stalker.special: Defeats Tribal Chief when attacking, weakest otherwise
shadow_stalker.description: Stealthy assassin hidden in the night

tribal_totem.name: Tribal Totem
tribal_totem.description: Sacred totem carved with ancestral power

fire_pot.name: Fire Pot
fire_pot.special: Explodes and destroys any attacking unit except Trap Setters
fire_pot.description: Clay jar filled with burning pitch
